Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways
Diventa anche tu protagonista della nuova favola intitolata Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways del famoso provider iSoftBet, ispirata al racconto dei fratelli Grimm.  Con un gameplay composto da 6 rulli verticali e 1 orizzontale, una meccanica Megaways, potrai realizzare fino a 117.649 combinazioni potenzialmente vincenti. Ma non finisce qui… Scopri di più in questa recensione!
Gameplay, RTP e Vincite di Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways
Questa affascinante slot è composta da 6 rulli rotanti verticalmente e un rullo rotante orizzontale a 4 posizioni. Le modalità di vincita variano a seconda del numero di simboli a tendina, fino a un massimo di 117.649. I giocatori possono ottenere buone vincite piazzando le loro scommesse, che sono incluse in un range 0,20€ – 20€, e godersi la trama di questa favola popolare.
L’efficienza del gioco è del 96%. Ciò significa che per ogni puntata di 100€, la slot pagherà un premio di 96€. L’elevata volatilità ti permetterà di avere più possibilità di ricevere grandi vincite, ma anche più possibilità di perdere denaro. Pertanto, questa slot è adatta per i giocatori più esperti che cercano un’esperienza di gioco divertente ma anche molto redditizia.
Tema, Simboli e Moltiplicatori di Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways
Il tema della slot è basato sulla popolare storia dei fratelli Grimm, ambientata in un villaggio e foresta magici con un design molto carino. Sono presenti sia simboli speciali che classici, alcuni dei quali molto preziosi per realizzare buone vincite.
Per esempio, il gioco contiene un simbolo jolly che sostituisce tutti gli altri tranne i simboli scatter o misteriosi. I jolly compaiono solo sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 nel tracker superiore. Il simbolo misterioso si trasforma nello stesso normale simbolo a pagamento.
Le icone di alto valore sono la chiave d’oro, il cerchio da cucito, una bella ragazza e un arcolaio e regalano da 0,25x a 12,5x di puntata per linea.
Poi ci sono gli immancabili simboli a basso costo – A, K, Q, J, 10, 9 – che delizieranno i nostri lettori con moltiplicatori da 0,1x a 1,5x puntata per linea.
Funzioni Bonus e Giri Gratuiti Megaways

Vittorie a Cascata
Nel gioco, ogni simbolo vincente è sostituito da simboli a cascata che appaiono sopra i rulli. I simboli vincenti sul tracker superiore orizzontale saranno sostituiti da simboli che si spostano da destra a sinistra.
Durante queste vincite a cascata, il numero di modi sarà fissato allo stesso livello del giro vincente iniziale del giocatore;
Max Megaways
Questa funzione può essere attivata a qualsiasi giro, per cui hai la garanzia di ottenere il numero massimo di megaway per il giro corrente, vale a dire 117.649;


Rumpel Respins
Questa funzionalità extra verrà attivata quando sul campo di gioco compaiono almeno 5 simboli Scatter (una pentola d’oro). Successivamente, il giocatore riceve tre respins rinnovabili, durante i quali le icone che hanno avviato le funzioni vengono fissate nelle loro posizioni e le celle rimanenti restano vuote.
Solo gli Scatter o i booster possono cadere nelle celle vuote attivando a loro volta uno dei seguenti modificatori: Life Boost, Bobine Boost, Moltiplicatore e Prize Boost.


Domande Frequenti 
Posso iniziare a giocare a Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways con un gioco demo?

Sì! Ogni giocatore sul nostro sito ha l'opportunità di giocare in modalità demo per provare il gioco e poi passare alla modalità con soldi veri registrandosi in uno dei nostri casino sicuri.



Posso giocare a Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways usando un bonus in denaro?

Se hai ricevuto un bonus di benvenuto in un casinò della nostra lista, sarai in grado di utilizzare i tuoi fondi gratuiti su quasi tutte le slot, inclusa quelle di iSoftBet.



Posso giocare alla slot Megaways di Riches of Rumpelstiltskin su dispositivi mobili?

Certo, tutte le nuove slot online firmate iSoftBet, inclusa Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways, funzionano perfettamente su qualsiasi dispositivo e qualsiasi sito di casinò mobile.

raw_translation.response:
Join the adventure in the magical world of the famous fairy tale, Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways, from the renowned game provider, iSoftBet. With 6 vertical reels and 1 horizontal reel, featuring a Megaways mechanic, you can score up to 117,649 potentially winning combinations. But that's not all... Let's delve deeper into this review!

Gameplay, RTP and Wins of Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways
This captivating slot is made up of 6 vertically spinning reels and 1 horizontally spinning reel with 4 positions. The winning modes vary according to the number of symbols on the screen, up to a maximum of 117,649. Players can achieve good wins by placing bets within a range of €0.20-€20 and enjoy the plot of this popular fairy tale. The game's efficiency is 96%, which means that for every bet of 100€, the slot will award a prize of 96€. The high volatility will give you better chances of receiving big wins, but also higher chances of losing money. Therefore, this slot is suitable for experienced players who crave an engaging yet highly rewarding gaming experience.

Theme, Symbols and Multipliers of Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways
The slot is based on the popular fairy tale from the Grimm brothers and is set in a magical village and forest with a charming design. Special and classic symbols are featured, and some are very precious to achieve good wins. For instance, a wild symbol replaces all others except for scatter or mystery symbols. Wilds only appear on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 in the upper tracker. The mystery symbol transforms into the same normal paying symbol. High-value icons include the golden key, the sewing circle, a beautiful girl, and a spinning wheel, that grant 0.25x to 12.5x of bet per line. Then, there are the familiar low-cost symbols - A, K, Q, J, 10, 9 - that will delight our readers with multipliers ranging from 0.1x to 1.5x bet per line.

Bonus Features and Megaways Free Spins
Cascading Wins
In the game, each winning symbol is replaced by cascading symbols that appear above the reels. The winning symbols on the upper horizontal tracker will be replaced by symbols that move from right to left. During these cascading wins, the number of ways will be fixed on the same level of the player's initial winning spin.

Max Megaways
This feature can be activated on any spin, guaranteeing the maximum number of Megaways for the current spin, namely 117,649.

Rumpel Respins
This extra feature is triggered when at least 5 Scatter symbols (a pot of gold) appear on the game field. Then, the player receives three renewable respins, during which the icons that triggered the features are fixed in their positions, and the remaining cells remain empty. Only Scatter or booster symbols can fall into the empty cells, activating one of the following modifiers: Life Boost, Reels Boost, Multiplier, and Prize Boost.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can I play Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways with a demo game?

Yes! Every player on our site has the opportunity to play in demo mode to test the game before switching to real money mode by registering at one of our safe casinos.

Can I play Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways using bonus money?

If you have received a welcome bonus at one of our casino partners, you will be able to use your free funds on almost all the slots, including those from iSoftBet.

Can I play the Megaways slot Riches of Rumpelstiltskin on mobile devices?

Absolutely, all the new online slots from iSoftBet, including Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways, work perfectly on any device and any mobile casino site.

Review: Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways: A Review for Experienced Gamblers

Step into the world of the famous iSoftBet provider and become the protagonist of the new fairytale called Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways, inspired by the Grimm Brothers' story. With a gameplay composed of 6 vertical reels and 1 horizontal reel, along with a Megaways mechanism, players have the opportunity to achieve up to 117,649 potentially winning combinations. But that's not all... Keep reading to discover more in this review!

Gameplay, RTP and Wins of Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways

This charming slot is composed of 6 vertically spinning reels and a horizontally spinning 4-position reel. The winning modes vary depending on the number of symbols on the reels, up to a maximum of 117,649. Players can obtain good wins by placing their bets, which range from €0.20 to €20, and enjoy the plot of this popular fairy tale.

The game's efficiency is 96%, meaning that for every €100 bet, the slot will pay out a prize of €96. The high volatility of this game allows for more chances to receive big wins, but also more chances to lose money. Consequently, this slot is suitable for experienced players who seek a fun yet very profitable gaming experience.

Theme, Symbols, and Multipliers of Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways

The slot's theme is based on the popular Grimm Brothers' story, set in a magical village and forest with a very cute design. There are both special and classic symbols, some of which are very valuable for achieving good wins. For example, the game contains a wild symbol that replaces all others except for the scatter or mystery symbols. Wilds only appear on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 in the upper tracker. The mystery symbol transforms into the same normal paying symbol.

The high-value icons are the golden key, sewing circle, a beautiful girl, and a spinning wheel, which reward players with 0.25x to 12.5x their bet per line. Then there are the inevitable low-cost symbols - A, K, Q, J, 10, 9 - that will delight readers with multipliers from 0.1x to 1.5x per line.

Bonus Features and Megaways Free Spins

Cascade Wins: In the game, every winning symbol is replaced by cascading symbols that appear above the reels. Winning symbols on the upper horizontal tracker are replaced by symbols that move from right to left. During these cascade wins, the number of ways will be fixed at the same level as the initial winning spin of the player.

Max Megaways: This feature can be activated at any spin, guaranteeing the player obtains the maximum number of megaways for the current spin, i.e., 117,649.

Rumpel Respins: This extra functionality is activated when at least 5 scatter symbols (a pot of gold) appear on the playing field. The player then receives three renewable respins, during which the icons that triggered the functions are fixed in their positions and the remaining cells remain empty. Only Scatter or Boosters can fall into the empty cells, activating one of the following modifiers: Life Boost, Reel Boost, Multiplier, and Prize Boost.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I start playing Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways with a demo game?

Yes! Every player on our site has the opportunity to play in demo mode to try the game before transitioning to the mode with real money by registering at one of our secure casinos.

Can I play Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways using a cash bonus?

If you received a welcome bonus at one of the casinos on our list, you will be able to use your free funds on almost all slots, including those by iSoftBet.

Can I play Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways slot on mobile devices?

Certainly, all the new online slots signed by iSoftBet, including Riches of Rumpelstiltskin Megaways, work perfectly on any device and any mobile casino site.
